subject: Re: [junit] ActiveTestSuite confusion
msgSnippet: ... In my opinion, that might be the point. If all you want is one thread per object, then that doesn t test the thread safety of the object. To test whether
messageBody:
Kevin Bourrillion wrote:
>
> And this does basically that. But the problem is, all the threads are
> acting on the same actual TestCase instances. Meaning that my test case
> "firmament" becomes pretty much useless--an object I initialize in setUp()
> might have been mucked with by another thread by the time I use it!

In my opinion, that might be the point. If all you want is one thread per
object, then that doesn't test the thread safety of the object. To test whether
an object is thread safe, you need to have multiple threads accessing the same
object at the same time.

Kevin Mukhar
